      • createFeed

        public static org.apache.abdera.model.Feed createFeed(java.net.URI resourceUri,
                                      java.lang.String id,
                                      java.util.Date created)
        Creates a new feed whose ID is the specified resource URI, the title is a text title specified by the title, and the specified published date, and has a link to the resource with a relationship of #LINK_RELATION_SELF =
        Parameters:
        resourceUri - The URI of the resource used as the ID and is provided in the link
        id - The title of the feed
        created - The date the feed was published (created)
        Returns:
        the newly created feed

      • createFeed

        public static org.apache.abdera.model.Feed createFeed(java.net.URI resourceUri,
                                      java.lang.String id,

                                      java.net.URI generatorUri)
        Creates a new feed whose ID is the specified resource URI, the title is a text title specified by the title, and the specified published date, and has a link to the resource with a relationship of #LINK_RELATION_SELF =
        Parameters:
        resourceUri - The URI of the resource used as the ID and is provided in the link
        id - The title of the feed
        created - The date the feed was published (created)
        generatorUri - The URI of the resource that generated the feed.
        Returns:
        the newly created feed
